issue.title: www.usaudiomart.com
issue.body:

### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.17.3.2020 release System version: | `MacOS 15.7.2 (Build 24G325)` Browser: | Safari Tracking protection: | **General settings**:

Hide your search queries,
